activities: Kyriba receives limited, business contact information from its corporate customers, some of whom are located – and future customers who may be located - in the EU/EEA and Switzerland.  We collect such information in order to have a contact person within the organization to whom we can contact for administrative and general business purposes.  Such information is typically collected at the time an account is setup within the Kyriba application.  It is also possible (though not required or sought by Kyriba) that Kyriba customers may store personal information about their customers/clients within the Kyriba system, some of whom may be EU/EEA and/or Switzerland residents.
contactoff1: Office of the Chief Security Officer
contacttitle1: Sr. Director - Risk, Compliance and Contingency Management
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer business contact information; potentially customer’s customer’s business-related information.  None of such personal information is expected to be manually processed.
recoursemech: Judicial Arbitration and Mediation Services, Inc. (“JAMS”).
